v: So seven unmarried women will grab one man and say,
We will provide our own food and clothing.
All that we want is to no longer be disgraced because of not being married.”

v.v: But some day, Israel will be very beautiful and great.
All the people who will remain in Jerusalem, who did not die when the enemy destroyed Jerusalem,
That will happen when the Lord washes away the guilt of the women of Jerusalem,
Then Yahweh will send a cloud of smoke during the days and a flaming fire during the nights
It will shelter the people from the sun during the daytime
Now I will sing a song about Yahweh, my dear friend,
My friend plowed the ground and cleared away the stones.
Now this is what my friend Yahweh says:
What more could I have done for you
So, I will now tell you what I will do to Judah, the place that is like my vineyard.
I will cause it to become a wasteland
The nation of Israel is like the vineyard of Yahweh who is commander of the angel armies.
Terrible things will happen to those who keep acquiring houses and fields
